name: Super Slime Adventure
description:
I hope you enjoy it!!!

CONTROLS

-Arrow keys to move left or right

-Space Bar  to jump/double jump (if on a wall you can spam space as much as you want to jump to infinity)!!!

What is my Purpose is a pay-what-you-want title, which means that if you prefer to play it for free, it's perfectly okay to do so. But I'd really appreciate it a lot if you choose to click the "support this game" button above!
